metadata.title: PM grieved over assassination of ANPâ€™s Maulana Khan Zeb in Bajaur

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 11 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday expressed grief over the assassination of Awami National Party leader Maulana Khan Zeb in a targeted attack in Bajaur. Remembering the slain politician as a "very fine soul, and a staunch advocate for peace," the prime minister wrote on X that he was "grieved to learn about the assassination of Maulana Khan Zeb in a cowardly targeted attack in Bajaur." He extended his heartfelt condolences to the grieved family, colleagues, and the people of Bajaur and prayed for peace for the departed soul.
